dcterms:description: A collection of pairs of phrases regarding human activities, annotated with four different relations: similarity, relatedness, motivational alignment, and perceived actor congruence.

dcterms:description: The Sentences Involving Compositional Knowledge benchmark, which includes a large number of sentence pairs annotated in two dimensions: relatedness and entailment.
dcterms:title: SICK
